title: Unlocked Grey Warwick Skin
body:
Hey, there ! It's Lovely love,

does anyone else has obtained the Grey Warwick skin through HONOR CAPSULE? I just got it when I opened my first honor capsule that dropped when you arrive honor lv. 3 ~~~ I can't even imagine that kind of probability, it seems like a compensation for me after I lost a series of solo/duo rank game(about 6 matches) just now. Hopefully, I trust there is a large chance for me to get the Medieval Twitch skin from the second honor capsule~Oh, just kidding, Riot won't do that for me, that's the point. At least, I got the Warwick skin already, it's a good beginning, isn't it :)[](http://file:///C:/Users/HE/Pictures/Grey%20Warwick.png)

replies.body: My first honour capsule dropped Ashe champion shard, I guess that's the 'boobie prize'.
nah it's the ultimate prize for only the most honourable of players. The rare Ashe champion shard is worth a massive 150 IP, wow, lucky!!!
Lots of caches and chests that are ready to open but there is nothing new for me to unlock :(
In case you wanted proof I have it too :) http://imgur.com/a/yCWo9
I got Grey Warwick a few days ago :D
Cheers, we are the babies of Riot~That's great!
